componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Opportunity Tab Overview


The Opportunity tab contains the information for deals that are moving through the pipeline stages in the DELC. Each stage contains additional guidance under the 'Guidance for Success' header on the card right below this one.


In the upper right hand corner of this page, click 'Submit for Approval' to get a Quote approved by a PC or RVP. Once the Quote is approved, click 'Proposal Report' to generate a PDF version of the Quote. (Visit the 'Onboarding' tab for instructions on how to access a web-based version of the Proposal before it's been approved.)


Creating an Opportunity Screencast

Proposal Approval Screencast

Proposal PDF Screencast

Pipeline Stages Screencast

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: HELLO Adding 'Tasks' to an Opportunity is a great way to keep track of the to-dos that will move an Opportunity forward. See below for a list of upcoming Tasks related to the Opportunity, and click 'New Task' or 'New Event' to create a new Activity that will automatically be associated with this Opportunity.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: See below for a list of completed Activities related to this opportunity.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Associating 'Contact Roles' with an Opportunity helps you keep track of an Opportunities important decision-makers. Click the 'Add Contact Roles' button to add important contacts from this Opportunity's Account. Once you have added Contacts to this card, you will be able to see related Activity on the Activity card below.


Contact Roles Screencast

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Adding Notes is a great way to keep information about each Opportunity organized and easy to find. Text notes linked to this Opportunity are listed below. Click 'New' to create a Note that will automatically be associated with this Opportunity.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Adding Products is how you create the individual line items that are a part of an Opportunity and Quote. If your Opportunity has more than one Quote, the Products listed below are from the synced Quote on the Quotes card.


Click 'Add Products' to add additional line items or 'Edit Products' to update existing line items.


Helpful hint when adding products: Use quotes to search for exact phrases (e.g. "Grade 2" "Family Stories")


Click here to see ARC's best practices for finding Products in Salesforce.


Products Screencast

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Creating Quotes allows you to show a potential customer multiple purchase options. For example, you can create one Quote for a K-2 implementation and a second Quote for a K-5 implementation all on the same Opportunity. To create a Quote, click the 'New Quote' button below, fill out the 'Quote Name' field and hit 'Save'.


Important Note: Although you can create multiple Quotes, only one at a time can be active, or 'synced' to the Opportunity. The cost of the synced Quote will show up as the Opportunity's amount, and the synced Quote's Products will be shown as the Opportunity's Products on the Products card below. To sync a Quote to an Opportunity, click on the Quotes' name and then click on the 'Start Sync' button in the upper right-hand corner.


Quotes Screencast

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Uploading Files linked to an Opportunity will help you keep track the Opportunity's important documents. Click 'Upload Files' to associate new Files with this Opportunity. Click 'Add Files' to associate Files that have already been added to Salesforce to this Opportunity.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: If you have added Contacts to this Opportunity on the Contact Roles card above, you will see Activity related to these Contacts below.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: See below for the history and dates of Stage changes for this Opportunity.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: The three tabs below contain important information added by other departments about the Opportunity as it is going through the pipeline and once the Purchase Order has been received.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: This card lists other Opportunities connected to this Opportunity's Account.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: See below for the Approval History related to this Opportunity.
